languages.text: "Взглянуть на т{mf|ого|у}, кто нарушил служение моей паствы и планы моего владыки. Член моего легиона... Фабрикатор-Цензор... ты считаешь их смерть триумфом, но это лишь небольшая помеха на нашем пути. Есть иные миры, служащие нашей цели. Есть другие источники пластали и адамантиума. Радуйся своей победе — она ничего не изменит".

traits.locale_text: "Немногое — лишь взглянуть на т{mf|ого|у}, кто нарушил покой Фабрикатора, прежде верно исполнявшего свой долг перед Хаосом. Он не соизволил сообщить мне о твоем появлении, сочтя тебя слишком незначительной угрозой... но кровь в твоих жилах шепчет духам о том, что ты стоишь большего внимания".

languages.text: "I want to look upon the one who has disrupted my flock's duties and my master's plans. That warrior from my Legion... the Fabricator-Censor... You think of their deaths as a triumph; however, it is but a minor hindrance on our path. There are other worlds that serve our goals. There are other sources of plasteel and adamantine. Revel in your victory — it will change nothing."
languages.original_text: "Взглянуть на т{mf|ого|у}, кто нарушил служение моей паствы и планы моего владыки. Член моего легиона... Фабрикатор-Цензор... ты считаешь их смерть триумфом, но это лишь небольшая помеха на нашем пути. Есть иные миры, служащие нашей цели. Есть другие источники пластали и адамантиума. Радуйся своей победе — она ничего не изменит".

traits.locale_text: "I want to look upon the one who has disrupted my minions' service and my master's plans. That warrior from my Legion... The Fabricator... You think of their deaths as a triumph, but it is but a minor hindrance on our path. There are other worlds that serve our goals. There are other sources of plasteel and adamantium. Revel in your victory — it will change nothing."

You think of their deaths as a triumph, but it is but a minor hindrance on our path. There are other worlds that serve our goals. There are other sources of plasteel and adamantium. Revel in your victory — it will change nothing."

Revel in your victory — it will change nothing."

You think of their deaths as a triumph; however, it is but a minor hindrance on our path. There are other worlds that serve our goals. There are other sources of plasteel and adamantine. Revel in your victory — it will change nothing."

languages.text: «Quiero ver a quien ha frustrado los deberes de mi rebaño y los planes de mi señor. El guerrero de mi legión... el fabricator-censor... tal vez creas que sus muertes son un triunfo, pero apenas son un ligero contratiempo en nuestra ruta. Hay otros mundos que sirven a nuestros propósitos. Hay otras fuentes de plastiacero y adamantino. Disfruta de tu victoria... pero no cambiará nada».
languages.original_text: "I want to look upon the one who has disrupted my flock's duties and my master's plans. That warrior from my Legion... the Fabricator-Censor... You think of their deaths as a triumph; however, it is but a minor hindrance on our path. There are other worlds that serve our goals. There are other sources of plasteel and adamantine. Revel in your victory — it will change nothing."

traits.locale_text: «Quiero ver a quien ha frustrado los deberes de mi rebaño y los planes de mi señor. El guerrero de mi legión... el fabricator-censor... tal vez creas que sus muertes son un triunfo, pero apenas son un ligero contratiempo en nuestra ruta. Hay otros mundos que sirven a nuestros propósitos. Hay otras fuentes de plastiacero y adamantio. Disfruta de tu victoria... pero no cambiará nada».

languages.text: 「群れの任務と、我が主の計画を妨害した奴をひと目見たい。我が兵団の戦士…ファブリケーター・センサー…お前は彼らの死を勝利とみなしているかもしれないが、我々の道を阻む些細な障害に過ぎない。目的に尽くしてくれている惑星は他にもある。プラスチールやアダマンチウムは他の場所でも採掘できる。しょうもない勝利に歓喜するといい。そのようなことをしたところで、我々にとっては何も変わらぬ」
languages.original_text: "I want to look upon the one who has disrupted my flock's duties and my master's plans. That warrior from my Legion... the Fabricator-Censor... You think of their deaths as a triumph; however, it is but a minor hindrance on our path. There are other worlds that serve our goals. There are other sources of plasteel and adamantine. Revel in your victory — it will change nothing."

traits.locale_text: 「群れの任務と、我が主の計画を妨害した奴をひと目見たい。我が兵団の戦士…ファブリケーター・センサー…お前は彼らの死を勝利とみなしているかもしれないが、我々の道を阻む些細な障害に過ぎない。目的に尽くしてくれている惑星は他にもある。プラスチールやアダマンチウムは他の場所でも採掘できる。しょうもない勝利に歓喜するといい。そのようなことをしたところで、我々にとっては何も変わらぬ」

languages.text: “我想看看，究竟是谁在阻挠我的手下履行职责，破坏我主人的计划。那个来自我军团的战士……铸造审查师……你把他们的死当做一场胜利。然而，这不过是我们前进道路上的小小阻碍，还有别的世界为我们的目标服务，还有别的地方为我们提供塑钢与精金。尽管陶醉在你的胜利之中吧，但它改变不了什么。”
languages.original_text: "I want to look upon the one who has disrupted my flock's duties and my master's plans. That warrior from my Legion... the Fabricator-Censor... You think of their deaths as a triumph; however, it is but a minor hindrance on our path. There are other worlds that serve our goals. There are other sources of plasteel and adamantine. Revel in your victory — it will change nothing."

traits.locale_text: “我想看看，究竟是谁在阻挠我的手下履行职责，破坏我主人的计划。那个来自我军团的战士……铸造审查师……你把他们的死当做一场胜利。然而，这不过是我们前进道路上的小小阻碍，还有别的世界为我们的目标服务，还有别的地方为我们提供塑钢与精金。尽管陶醉在你的胜利之中吧，但它改变不了什么。”

languages.text: « Je voulais rencontrer {mf|celui|celle} qui a perturbé le travail de mes ouailles et les plans de mon maître. Ce guerrier de ma légion... le fabricator-censeur... Vous considérez son trépas comme une victoire, mais ce n'est jamais qu'une entorse mineure à notre grand projet. D'autres mondes servent déjà notre dessein, comme il existe d'autres sources de plastacier et d'adamantine. Vous aurez beau vous enorgueillir de votre misérable victoire, cela ne changera rien. »
languages.original_text: "I want to look upon the one who has disrupted my flock's duties and my master's plans. That warrior from my Legion... the Fabricator-Censor... You think of their deaths as a triumph; however, it is but a minor hindrance on our path. There are other worlds that serve our goals. There are other sources of plasteel and adamantine. Revel in your victory — it will change nothing."

traits.locale_text: « Je voulais rencontrer {mf|celui|celle} qui a perturbé le travail de mes ouailles et les plans de mon maître. Ce guerrier de ma légion... le fabricator-censeur... Vous considérez son trépas comme une victoire, mais il ne s'agit rien de plus que d'une entorse mineure à notre grand projet. D'autres mondes servent déjà notre dessein, comme il existe d'autres sources de plastacier et d'adamantium. Vous aurez beau vous enorgueillir de votre misérable victoire, cela ne changera rien. »

languages.text: "Ich will den sehen, der die Pflichten meiner Diener und die Pläne meines Meisters gestört hat. Der Krieger aus meiner Legion ... der Fabricator-Zensor ... Ihr seht seinen Tod als Triumph, doch er ist lediglich ein kleines Hindernis auf unserem Pfad. Es gibt noch andere Welten, die unseren Zielen dienen. Es gibt andere Quellen von Plaststahl und Adamant. Genießt Euren Sieg ... er wird nichts ändern."
languages.original_text: "I want to look upon the one who has disrupted my flock's duties and my master's plans. That warrior from my Legion... the Fabricator-Censor... You think of their deaths as a triumph; however, it is but a minor hindrance on our path. There are other worlds that serve our goals. There are other sources of plasteel and adamantine. Revel in your victory — it will change nothing."

traits.locale_text: "Ich will den sehen, der die Pflichten meiner Diener und die Pläne meines Meisters gestört hat. Der Krieger aus meiner Legion ... der Fabricator-Zensor ... Ihr seht seinen Tod als Triumph, doch er ist lediglich ein kleines Hindernis auf unserem Pfad. Es gibt noch andere Welten, die unseren Zielen dienen. Es gibt auch anderswo Plaststahl und Adamantium. Genießt Euren Sieg — er wird nichts ändern."

languages.text: "Sürümün vazifelerine ve efendimin planlarına çomak sokanın kim olduğunu görmek istiyorum. Lejyonumdaki savaşçı... Denetçi Fabrikatör... Ölümlerini birer zafer olarak görüyorsun. Oysa bunlar, yolumuza çıkan ufak engellerden ibaret. Amaçlarımız uğruna çalışan başka dünyalar da var. Plasçelik ve adamantiyum sağlayan başka kaynaklarımız var. Zaferini iyice kutla, faydasını görmeyeceksin."
languages.original_text: "I want to look upon the one who has disrupted my flock's duties and my master's plans. That warrior from my Legion... the Fabricator-Censor... You think of their deaths as a triumph; however, it is but a minor hindrance on our path. There are other worlds that serve our goals. There are other sources of plasteel and adamantine. Revel in your victory — it will change nothing."

traits.locale_text: “Sürümün vazifelerine ve efendimin planlarına çomak sokanın kim olduğunu görmek istiyorum. Lejyonumdaki o savaşçı... Denetçi Fabrikatör... Ölümlerini bir zafer olarak görüyorsun. Ancak bunlar, bizim yolumuzda ufak engellerden ibaret. Amaçlarımız uğruna çalışan diğer dünyalar da var. Plasçelik ve adamantiyum sağlayan başka kaynaklarımız var. Zaferini iyice kutla, bir işe yaramayacak.”
